items.question: What types of images work best for AI Inpainting?
items.answer: AI Inpainting performs optimally on images with clear subjects and backgrounds. High-resolution images give better results, but the AI remains effective on various types, including product photos and personal images.

items.question: Can I undo changes made during inpainting?
items.answer: Yes! Our platform allows you to easily revert changes if you're not satisfied with the result. You can always re-edit the image for different outcomes.

items.question: Is it possible to use inpainting for batch image processing?
items.answer: Currently, batch processing is not supported, but we're working to introduce this feature. For now, each image must be processed individually.

items.question: How detailed can the inpainting process be?
items.answer: The AI is designed to handle both straightforward object removals and more complex backgrounds, allowing for an exceptionally detailed restoration of images.

items.question: Can I enhance quality after the inpainting is done?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can apply additional enhancements using our suite of tools to further refine your images post-inpainting.

items.question: What is the pricing model for AI Inpainting?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a pay-as-you-go model, where you pay only for the images you enhance. There are no subscriptions or hidden fees.

items.question: What is the usual turnaround time for inpainting?
items.answer: The inpainting process typically takes just a few minutes, thanks to the efficiency of our AI technologies.

items.question: Do I receive commercial licenses for the enhanced images?
items.answer: Yes! All enhanced images through WaveSpeed include full commercial usage rights, allowing you to use them freely for marketing or sales.

items.question: What kind of support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We provide robust support including comprehensive guides, tutorials, and a responsive support team available via email and chat.
